typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	LoadDate as timestamp (currentUTC("Berlin"))
}
source(output(
		Product_SID as integer,
		LoadDate as timestamp,
		RecordSource as string,
		Product_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> HubProducts
source(output(
		OrderID as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Quantity as integer,
		Discount as float
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> OrderDetails
source(output(
		Order_SID as integer,
		Order_ID as integer,
		LoadDate as timestamp,
		RecordSource as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> HubOrders
OrderDetails, HubOrders join(OrderID == Order_ID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinHubOrders
JoinHubOrders, HubProducts join(ProductID == Product_ID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinHubProducts
JoinHubProducts select(mapColumn(
		Order_SID,
		Product_SID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSID
SelectSID derive(LoadDate = $LoadDate,
		RecordSource = "Northwind") ~> AbgeleiteteSpalte1
AbgeleiteteSpalte1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Link_Order_Details_SID as integer,
		Product_SID as integer,
		Order_SID as integer,
		LoadDate as timestamp,
		RecordSource as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Product_SID,
		Order_SID,
		LoadDate,
		RecordSource
	)) ~> LinkOrderDetails

parameters{
	LoadDate as timestamp (currentUTC("Berlin"))
}
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		ProductName as string,
		SupplierID as integer,
		CategoryID as integer,
		QuantityPerUnit as string,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		UnitsInStock as integer,
		UnitsOnOrder as integer,
		ReorderLevel as integer,
		Discontinued as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> NortwhindProducts
source(output(
		Product_SID as integer,
		LoadDate as timestamp,
		RecordSource as string,
		Product_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DVHubProducts
source(output(
		Order_SID as integer,
		Order_ID as integer,
		LoadDate as timestamp,
		RecordSource as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> HubOrders
source(output(
		OrderID as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Quantity as integer,
		Discount as float
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> OrderDetails
source(output(
		Product_SID as integer,
		LoadDate as timestamp,
		RecordSource as string,
		Product_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> HubProduct
source(output(
		Link_Order_Details_SID as integer,
		Product_SID as integer,
		Order_SID as integer,
		LoadDate as timestamp,
		RecordSource as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> LinkOrderDetails
NortwhindProducts, DVHubProducts join(ProductID == Product_ID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProducts
JoinProducts select(mapColumn(
		ProductName,
		Product_SID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSatProductsAttributes
SelectSatProductsAttributes derive(LoadDate = $LoadDate,
		RecordSource = "Northwind") ~> AbgeleiteteSpalte1
OrderDetails, HubOrders join(OrderID == Order_ID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Verbinden1
Verbinden1, DVHubProducts join(ProductID == Product_ID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Verbinden2
Verbinden2, LinkOrderDetails join(HubOrders@Order_SID == LinkOrderDetails@Order_SID
	&& DVHubProducts@Product_SID == LinkOrderDetails@Product_SID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Verbinden3
Verbinden3 select(mapColumn(
		UnitPrice,
		Quantity,
		Link_Order_Details_SID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOrderDetailsAttributes
SelectOrderDetailsAttributes derive(LoadDate = $LoadDate,
		RecordSource = "Northwind") ~> AbgeleiteteSpalte2
AbgeleiteteSpalte1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Product_SID as integer,
		ProductName as string,
		LoadDate as timestamp,
		RecordSource as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Product_SID,
		ProductName,
		LoadDate,
		RecordSource
	)) ~> SatProducts
AbgeleiteteSpalte2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Link_Order_Details_SID as integer,
		Quantity as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(5,2),
		LoadDate as timestamp,
		RecordSource as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Link_Order_Details_SID,
		Quantity,
		UnitPrice,
		LoadDate,
		RecordSource
	)) ~> SatOrderDetails
